title: Visualizing Stock Market Structure
description: In this lab, we will use several unsupervised learning techniques to extract the structure of the stock market from variations in historical quotes. We will use the daily variation in quote price to find which quotes are correlated conditionally on the others. Then, we will use clustering to group together quotes that behave similarly. Finally, we will lay out the different symbols on a 2D canvas using manifold techniques to retrieve 2D embedding.

meta.title: Visualizing Stock Market Structure
meta.description: Explore the hidden structure of the stock market using unsupervised learning techniques.
meta.keywords: stock market, unsupervised learning, data visualization, correlation analysis, clustering
